paper_keywords: fuzzy reasoning spiking neural P system with trapezoidal fuzzy number
paper_abstract: This paper discusses the application of fuzzy reasoning spiking neural P systems with trapezoidal fuzzy numbers (tFRSN P systems) to fault diagnosis of power systems, where a matrix-based fuzzy reasoning algorithm based on the dynamic firing mechanism of neurons is used to develop the inference ability of tFRSN P systems from classical reasoning to fuzzy reasoning. Some case studies show the effectiveness of the presented method. We also briefly draw comparisons between the presented method and several main fault diagnosis approaches from the perspectives of knowledge representation and inference process.
paper_title: Application of Fuzzy Reasoning Spiking Neural P Systems to Fault Diagnosis
